source: Sierra Peak Section (SPS) Peaks List with Scrambler Ratings

peak_flags.emblem_peak: ** — one of the most significant SPS peaks
peak_flags.vagmarten_list: # — appears on the Vagmarten Peak List
peak_flags.tahoe_ogul_list: @ — appears on the Tahoe-Ogul Peak List

elevation.+: Minimum elevation; true summit may be higher or exact elevation unconfirmed

yds_rating.description: Yosemite Decimal System class rating for the approach
yds_rating.s_notation: '2s3' spans class 2 to 3 depending on conditions/variation

scrambling_rating.sr_notation: 'S-2.1/srS-3.0' — approach is S-2.1, summit rocks are S-3.0
scrambling_rating.yds_notation: 'S-3.2/srYDS-5.6' — approach is S-3.2, summit rocks require YDS 5.6 roped climbing

status.active: Peak is on the current SPS list
status.suspended: Peak temporarily removed from the SPS list

ascents.notes: Getting one more ridge run in at the end of this season. Invited Paul to join me and Ben. Camped at Wrights Lake and went up Price first and traversed to Pyramid
Jst back from Europe I joined Ben for a Tripple Training sprint. We went the other way on the ridge starting with Pyramid this time.
